languages.text: "Их язык насилия — богохульная пародия искусства Кровавой паутины. Через порезы и проколы мы обращаемся к Неумирающему, а они — кривляются пред ликом небытия".
languages.translation_comment: Marazhai — "The Cult will not forgive us for gutting their best fighters. I think we are already being tracked by a few individuals whose speciality is hunting champions — our heads will fetch a very high price."

languages.text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."
languages.original_text: "Их язык насилия — богохульная пародия искусства Кровавой паутины. Через порезы и проколы мы обращаемся к Неумирающему, а они — кривляются пред ликом небытия".

traits.locale_text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."
"Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."

"Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."

languages.text: "Ihre Sprache der Gewalt ist eine blasphemische Parodie der Kunst des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Mit jedem Schnitt und jedem Stich sprechen wir den Todlosen an, während sie vor dem Gesicht des Nichts katzbuckeln."
languages.original_text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."

traits.locale_text: "Ihre Sprache der Gewalt ist eine blasphemische Parodie der Kunst des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Mit jedem Schnitt und jedem Stich sprechen wir den Todlosen an, während sie vor dem Gesicht des Nichts katzbuckeln."

languages.text: « Leur langage de violence est une parodie blasphématoire de l'art de la Toile de Sang. Chaque fois que nous frappons de taille ou d'estoc, nous nous adressons à l'Immortel, tandis qu'ils rampent devant la face du néant. »
languages.original_text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."

traits.locale_text: « Leur langage de violence est une parodie blasphématoire de l'art de la Toile de Sang. Chaque fois que nous frappons de taille ou d'estoc, nous nous adressons à l'Immortel, tandis qu'ils rampent devant la face du néant. »

languages.text: «Su lenguaje violento es una blasfema parodia del arte de la Red Sanguinolenta. Con cada corte y cada perforación, clamamos al Inmortal, mientras que ellos se arrastran ante la nada».
languages.original_text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."

traits.locale_text: «Su lenguaje violento es una blasfema parodia del arte de la Red Sanguinolenta. Con cada corte y cada perforación, clamamos al Inmortal, mientras que ellos se arrastran ante la nada».

languages.text: 「彼らの暴力的な言葉は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの芸術を冒涜するパロディである。切り刻み、穴を開けるたびに、我々は不死の者に語りかけている。その間彼らは無の前にひれ伏すんだ」
languages.original_text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの暴力的な言葉は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの芸術を冒涜するパロディである。切り刻み、穴を開けるたびに、我々は不死の者に語りかけている。その間彼らは無の前にひれ伏すんだ」

languages.text: “他们的暴力简直是对织血罗网艺术的亵渎性模仿。我们的每次劈砍与刺击，都是在向不死之神献上祈祷，可他们却在虚无面前卑躬屈膝。”
languages.original_text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."

traits.locale_text: “他们的暴力简直是对织血罗网艺术的亵渎性模仿。我们的每次劈砍与刺击，都是在向不死之神献上祈祷，可他们却在虚无面前卑躬屈膝。”

languages.original_text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."

languages.text: "Kullandıkları şiddet dili, Kanipi Ağı sanatının günahkâr bir parodisi. Biz, her bir kesik ve delikle Ölmeyen'e sesleniriz. Onlarsa hiçliğin sureti karşısında dizlerine kapanmışlar."
languages.original_text: "Their language of violence is a blasphemous parody of the art of the Bloodspun Web. With every cut and puncture, we address the Undying One, while they grovel before the face of nothingness."
